data.title: Using Wikipedia

data.text:
Guests: Phoebe Ayers

How Wikipedia Works, The Boon Squirt, Book Closeout's Kids Section, Tiny Revolutionary, and more.

Our guest is Pheobe Ayers, librarian and one of the authors of How Wikipedia Works

Spend: The Boon Squirt

Save: Book Closeout's Kids Section

Give: Tiny Revolutionary's new line of Giving Tees

Other links: DonorsChoose

Audible pick of the week: Downtown Owl by Chuck Klosterman read by Philip Baker Hall. For a free audiobook, visit AudibleKids.com/jumpingmonkeys.

Full show notes available on Megan's blog, JumpingMonkeys.com.

The Jumping Monkeys theme is by Paul Minshall.
